thread.title: Hotel scribe
thread.title_full: Hotel scribe - Review of Hotel Scribe Paris Opera by Sofitel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: elizabethrE8489VH
title: Hotel scribe
text: This is a fantastic hotel, they helped me celebrate my anniversary. I surprised my husband with balloons and pastries cheese and biscuits which was placed in our room before we arrived. Pauleen was great, she organised this for us. Hotel scribe is in a great central location, for everything!!! We booked bed and breakfast which was fantastic. Staff were very helpful and welcoming. Clean and well kept. I would definitely recommend this hotel and location.
